changelog: Accidentally cleared BitS entrance (and there's no way to set it without resetting all). Wups.
Bug fix from 1.2.2: Fix island access not expecting LJ (was TJ wups).
Overhaul of layout.
Removal of Entrance Randomization toggle (wasn't needed).
Settings for auto-tracking star requirements or entrances when connected to AP server.
New images for moves (credit for which goes to Hartflip0218 on DeviantArt).
Decrease size of locations summary so min window size can be smaller.
Fix issue where entrances would reset if PopTracker was closed.
Fix logic issue with Mario Wings to the Sky not requiring cannon.
Feature: Created a locations tracker that displays all locations in one tab. Does not currently factor in accessibility.
Feature: Add auto-update support.
Refactor: Changed 'Wall Kick' icon to show 'WK' instead of 'WJ'.
Bug Fix: 'Cool, Cool Mountain: Wall Kicks will Work' star no longer shows as always inaccessible.
Feature: Unset accessible entrances show as blue, with a colored icon in the bottom right corner indicating accessibility level
Feature: AP Auto-tracking now detects if 100 coin stars are enabled.
Feature: Quality of life features for clearing or resetting multiple area entrances.
Refactor: Changed ER buttons to be more legible.
Bug Fix: Reloading pack resets ER state.
Bug Fix: Key state is reset and recalculated on AP connection.
Bug Fix: Fix multiple stage accessibility issues.
Bug Fix: Area Randomization now longer enabled automatically on AP connection, if not enabled.
Feature: Initial official release.
